Proper Skin Cleansing

Clean skin is the foundation of any effective skincare routine. Cleansing removes impurities, makeup, and excess sebum, allowing subsequent products to work more effectively.

Extra tip: Cleanse your face twice a day: in the morning to remove overnight sebum and in the evening to eliminate makeup and pollution.

  • Oily skin:
    Choose a mattifying cleansing gel.
  • Dry skin:
    Opt for a gentle cleansing foam or a hydrating cleansing milk.
  • Sensitive skin:
    Fragrance-free products with soothing ingredients are ideal.

Hydration â€“ The Step You Shouldn't Skip

Hydration is essential for skin health, whether you have oily or dry skin. A moisturizer protects the skin's barrier and prevents water loss.

Extra tip: Apply moisturizer immediately after washing, on slightly damp skin, for better absorption.

  • Oily skin:
    Choose lightweight textures like hydrating gels.
  • Dry skin:
    Opt for rich creams with ceramides and shea butter.
  • Combination skin:
    Use medium-texture products suitable for both dry and oily areas.

Lifestyle Matters

Beautiful skin is not just about external care but also a healthy lifestyle.

Extra tip: Avoid excessive stress and introduce relaxation practices like yoga or meditation.

  • Hydration:
    Drink at least 2 liters of water daily.
  • Diet:
    Include antioxidant-rich foods in your diet, such as berries, avocados, and nuts.
  • Rest:
    Sleep at least 7-8 hours a night to allow your skin to regenerate.
